summary: The dead do not need rest nor shelter
descriptionHtml:
Arvak is dead. This is a fact, given to us by Bethesda.
The undead do not need to rest. This is known to anybody who\'s ever seen zombie media.
So why in the name of the Nine does Arvak get tired?

As you might guess this bothered me. So I looked here to see if someone hadn\'t done something about this grievous mistake.
Reduced casting cost, faster, better looking, but a horse that still gets tired.
So, it fell to me.

What this mod actually does:
As you might\'ve guessed from the semi-rant above, Arvak now has what I call \'conceptually infinite stamina\'.
It\'s actually 32867 units of stamina (the max the game engine processes). So, you could, in theory, run him out of stamina. In theory.

Installation:
Download and drop into your Data folder. Simple as that.

If you find any problems, let me know.
Arvak running out of stamina in a short time would be a big one.
author: Andellmere
